definition: to dye/to catch (a disease)/to acquire (bad habits etc)/to contaminate/to add color washes to a painting

sentences.english: The nuclear chromatin in the outer nuclear layer gathered toward the center with the uneven distribution.
sentences.chinese: 外核层细胞核染色质固缩，分布不均匀，向中央聚集。

sentences.english: Subsequently, chromatin is isolated from nuclei and subjected to sonication.
sentences.chinese: 随后，染色质从细胞核中分离并进行超声打断。

sentences.english: Zones of loosely arranged euchromatin are located mainly in the center of the nucleus.
sentences.chinese: 疏松的染色质区带主要位于细胞核的中心部。

sentences.english: The DNA fragmentation was examined by agarose gel electrophoresis.
sentences.chinese: 琼脂糖凝胶电泳检测染色质DNA断裂。

sentences.english: After synapsis, unwound chromatin fibers in the form of loops are in association with the lateral elements.
sentences.chinese: 在联合发生后，染色质纤维解聚成环状附着在侧带上。

sentences.english: Methylation of chromatin causes it to condense.
sentences.chinese: 染色质甲基化后会出现凝缩。

sentences.english: The chromatin is vesicular, and small nucleoli are present.
sentences.chinese: 染色质呈泡状，可见小的核仁。

sentences.english: That which shows the "normal" condensation pattern is called euchromatin .
sentences.chinese: 那些表现“正常的”浓缩格式的部分叫做常染色质。

sentences.english: What other functions abundant heterochromatin may perform are still an open question.
sentences.chinese: 至于大量的异染色质还有什么作用仍然是一个问题。

sentences.english: The degree of coiling of the chromatin varies during cell activity.
sentences.chinese: 染色质的卷曲程度因细胞的功能活动而不同。

sentences.english: Derepression of chromatin to an open conformation may lead to the promotion of gene transcription.
sentences.chinese: 染色质去阻扼后出现的开放构象能促进基因转录。

sentences.english: At same time, thickening of nuclear membrane and chromatin reticular structure of tumor cell were discussed.
sentences.chinese: 对癌细胞的核膜增厚和染色质网状结构提出了讨论。

sentences.english: Nucleosome is the basic unit of chromatin.
sentences.chinese: 核小体是染色质的基本单位。
